Firstly the horse riding section of the trip. Sam our wrangler, was knowledgeable, more than competent and incredibly friendly. The...
title: Holiday by which all others will be judged

content: So fun and adventurous! The guides are very nice and helpful! The water was nice and cool on that hot day, so we didn't mind being splashed. I enjoyed rafting with Wild River Adventures very much!
title: Excellent and fun!

content: The white water trip was fantastic and our guide, Bradley, was extremely entertaining and very knowledgeable about the waters and features of the river. The riverside dinner was cooked after the trip and was very good.
title: Great trip and good food

content: Everyone we worked with in booking the trip was helpful and friendly. We had to add people at the last minute and change the day. They accomodated us with no problem. Our guides were great and a lot of fun. It was a great experience...
title: Family All Day rafting trip with Joe and Zach

title: First time and happy!

content: My husband and I did the half day rafting trip with a delicious dinner afterwards. Alex was our awesome river guide and also cooked our dinner. She was great and the day was well worth it! We would highly recommend this rafting company.
title: Best Salmon dinner after rafting with a great view on the river!

content: We did the Saddle/Paddle package where we went for a 2 hour ride in the morning, then went for a 2-4 hour rafting trip in the afternoon. The horseback riding was not what I anticipated - not scenic at all. Had I known, would have...
title: Mixed Review on Horseback Ride, but great White Water Rafting!

content: The ride was just what we were looking for! The guides were very informative. The water and scenery were beautiful while not to difficult! They offered us everything we needed in equipment and knowledge base that we needed to have a good time
title: Whitewater fun

content: Had an amazing fishing trip! All of our group were novices. Guides were friendly and did amazing job teaching and putting us on the fish. Some of the most beautiful scenery as well. Thanks for an incredible memory!

content:
The whitewater rafting was excellent, the saddle ride was not so good.

content: I did the Bow River/Hoodoo raft trip with my 7 and 9 year old. It was an enjoyable and lovely hour! It was an easy walk to the launch point from the Fairmont Banff Springs Hotel. Our guide was entertaining and knowledgeable about the area....
title: Fun with the kids!

content: What a fun float! Gorgeous scenery...too bad we didn't see any wildlife, but Dean, our guide, made the trip really fun. We learned a lot about the river, the history of the area and some interesting facts about the wildlife.
title: Great time on the river

content: Our tour guide was so full of knowledge, the weather was amazing and the scenery was beautiful. We got to see sides of Mount Rundle, Tunnel Mountain and Cascade that aren't accessible from the road. The rapids are level 2 so there was barely a...
title: Short and sweet

content:
We visited in June this year and our first few days in wonderful Canada was spent in Banff.
Wanting to experience as much as possible we took the one hour Hoodoo tour. It was a beautiful if unseasonably warm day and we felt like explorers...
title: Infinity and Beyond! ......almost.

content: We took the 3-hour float tour in the afternoon with Dean. It was peaceful, fun, interesting, and beautiful. Dean is really experienced, has a relaxed vibe about him, and is full of interesting stories about Banff, rafting, rivers, India, and world travel. We hardly saw...
title: Best thing we did in Banff

content: Last week we had did our first Float Safari in Banff. While I am still perplexed by the term 'safari' in the Canadian context, it was great fun. Unfortunately we didn't see any beasties, but the tour guide Andrew was extremely engaging and well informed....
title: Andrew was fantastic!

content: We went with our group and enjoyed the beautiful scenery of the river. Our guide was funny, nice and had a lot of information on the local wildlife. This is a very enjoyable trip for kids and older people alike. It is longer than what...
title: Beautiful and peaceful.

content: Booked this with a friend and was not disappointed. Our guide "Andrew" had interesting tidbits of info for the region and had fabulous funny antidotes about prior customers. I highly recommend this fun time.
title: 3 hour raft trip

content: My husband and I did the 2-hour option "River Safari" option with Rocky Mountain Raft Tours. It was a lovely outing on a gorgeous day, where we basically had to do nothing but sit back and look around while our guide did all the raft....
title: Float trip in the Rockies

content:
We did the Hoodoo Tour which was really enjoyable and a great activity for all ages. It was really nice floating down the water while your guide tells you about the local area.
If it is a warm day would recommend wearing a hat as...
title: A Relaxing Float Down the River

content: We had a gentle raft float but it was the perfect way to intimately encounter the natural mountain beauty of the area. It is difficult to describe but you could see that no human had designed this area. It would have to be one of...
title: Drifting along With the Current

content: We were on an organized tour of the Canadian Rockies with a large tour operator and this was included. It was definitely one of the highlights of the tour. The raft guide was extremely well experienced and knowledgeable. We went in mid June so there...
title: Relaxing rafting

content: We had a great time on this level 2 raft trip. The guide was personable and catered to both sides of the raft. The scenery was excellent. The water was a tad low so we scraped rocks on a couple of times. Would highly recommend...
title: Beautiful scenery

content: I was hoping for a more informative trip from the guide. This is a mellow trip down bow river to get a different view of Banff. Many trips like this that I have been on focused quite a bit on the natural and historical landmarks...
title: Good option to kill some time

content: I took the Hoodoo trip, which is a gentle float down the Bow river, as we had a young child in our party. It was a wonderful experience. Yes a little tame by comparison to some of the white water adventures on offer in the...
title: Majestic!

content: We floated down the turquoise waters of the Bow River on the 3-hour Safari Tour with Dean and loved every minute! The trip starts at the base of the Bow River Falls, just minutes from the Banff Springs Hotel and downtown, so it's very convenient....
title: Soak in the beauty of the Bow River

content: Definitely an average trip. It was truly for all ages with no adventure aspect (as advertised), an easy float down the river. Scenery on the water was slightly different from look out points. Our guide was friendly.
title: Float trip on Bow River

content: We booked this trip as it was recommended by others who had been on it . What can I say but WOW. The trip was amazing. We did the 3 hr float safari and loved every minute. Sandy our rafter was great at both rafting...
title: Fantastic trip !!!

content: I did this tour with a group of friends, and I have to say I was pleasantly surprised! I thought it was going to be boring, but the river goes at a nice pace. It's always good to see different views of Banff, so if...
title: A fun outdoor activity for any age.

content: We just came back from an amazing vacation in the Canadian Rockies. Our first day we took the Hoodoo float trip with Rocky Mountain Raft Tours. We had a great time and really enjoyed this part of our trip. The staff are very friendly &...
title: Great time rafting down the Bow River!

content: This is a Great one hour float trip down the bow river. We are not after so we enjoyed that this was truly a floatwith a decent current down the river. Saw a bald eagle, Mountain goats and a coyote. Our guide was great. We...
title: Hoodoo tour wonderful

content: My family took the 1 hr Hoodoo trip on 6/12. Our guide, Andrew, was wonderful, and made the trip delightful. We saw 4 grizzly bears on the side of the river bank, very close to the edge of the golf course. It's a memory that...
title: Highlight of our trip to Banff

content: After spending a week in Banff National Park driving from sight to sight it was a relief to discover this raft tour operating minutes from our hotel! We took an evening float trip and were spoiled by spectacular views of the mountains. We saw a...
title: Best way to see the mountains!

content: After several days of hiking around, this was a lovely way to spend a late afternoon. We did the "one hour" hoodoo trip. Our guide was great, fun and very pleasant, and the scenery was beautiful. No serious rapids, just a lovely float down the...
title: Very pleasant trip

content: Went on the hoodo tour yesterday, our guide was wonderful, absolutely no complaints. The scenery was fantastic . Our only complaint is that there were a bunch of German men on our tour, they were drinking just before we loaded onto the raft in plain...
title: Hoodo tour

content: We did the morning float trip followed by the afternoon white water rafting. Amazing is an over used word in my opinion, however there is now other way to describe it this was AMAZING. canoeists escort you and take video which you can buy when...
title: Incredible experience

content: We went there in Nov 2011. It was already snowing. Although we were on the bus for hours, once we got there. The whole Banf was already covered with snow. It was So Beautiful!! Strongly recommended!
title: Awesome!
